English: The meeting starts at 10 o'clock sharp.
French: La réunion commence à dix heures exactement.

English: Could you tell me what time it is?
My train departs at 5 in the evening.
French: Mon train part à cinq heures du soir.

English: Please set the clock to 30 minutes past the hour.
French: Veuillez ajuster l'horloge à quarante minutes après l'heure.

English: I'll be back in an hour from now.
It's still early, don't be late.
French: C'est encore tôt, n'arrive pas en retard.
Il arrive à 21h30 tous les jours.

English: We will start the movie at 7 pm.
